Heres the thing, when the new Janna hit the rift I made some cool plays downloaded the games and forgot to clip and save them to my PC and the new patches rolled and the previous patches games expired.. xDD

Thanks for asking tho :P
Took me a minute to realize that too when I was watching haha
what is a wrenchman?

The Wrenchmen Program is a sub-set of the Riot Games Volunteer Programs (: We focus on addressing a lot of the player concerns and issues posted in the Help & Support board. However, nowadays, I'm more focused on all things Boards related!

You can read more here:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen
1st place gets the G903 gaming mouse, 2nd place gets the G703 ;)

OOPs, I actually just read past the '9' and the '7' xd...

WIll you be having more contests in the future similar to this one? 

Maybe Riot should promote team based contests :D

We've had a number of contests this year. I recommend you regularly check the [Player Creations](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations) boards for any future contests :) 
And follow our [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LOL_Oceania) too.
What's the difference?
-.- not the same prize{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{champion:63}} **GJ guys!!!**
to be honest, i kind of thought the vayne 1v5 play was better then a nicely timed ultimate and a 3v3 triple kill :\

Ya joking right? a lazy xayah triple kill gets prize 1, but a 1v5 Nasus Pentakill into a Clean up Quadrakill in a diamond mmr ranked game doesn't get ranked at all.

Keep in mind this was BEFORE NASUS GOT BUFFED. Riot always favoring the low elo players....

The fuck is this?
yes That xayah triple was not a good play it did not deserve first place what-so-ever,
and who do you think should of won?

I personally dont think they watched all the submissions i submitted a 5 man azir ult to win the game like how does that not beat a 3v3 xayah clip or a lulu outplaying a bronze tower dive like if anything xRaptor should of got first

Definitely deserving!!!
